name: Football∘
description:
HUT-HUT! Get ready to throw a hail mary! Flex your quarterback skills.

Find your man, throw the ball, and upgrade your skills!
Only 1% can throw 10 clean passes in a row!

Features of Football by Puzzle Cats:
- Easy to play, hard to master
- Get huge touchdowns
- Complete challenging levels
- Make as many passes as possible
- Upgrade your skills
- Offline mode (play without wi-fi)
